basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The Coach Craig McAlister Academic Scholarship is offered by the College of Business with preference given to active UCO Hockey players who are sophomores or above in good academic standing. Students must have 30 credit hours completed at the time of application. Minimum of 2.5 cumulative GPA. Financial need to be considered. Eligibility Requirements College of Business majors Preference given to an active UCO Hockey player Completed 30+ hours Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.5 or higher Selection Process Financial need to be considered

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
